ygData.subject: Spiking Neural Networks
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, Has anyone tried NEAT with Spiking Neural Networks (SNNs)? I m aware of some works in indirect genetic encoding based in developmental biology, which

Hi all,

Has anyone tried NEAT with Spiking Neural Networks (SNNs)?

I'm aware of some works in indirect genetic encoding based in
developmental biology, which is a subject of great matter. It would
also be interesting to work with more biologically plausible neural
networks.

SNNs are capable to encode information in the individual frequency of
spikes and most of the work in the field is concentrated in
computational neuroscience only.

I was wondering how SNN could be used with NEAT in evolving more
'realistic' neural controllers and how would that be compared to the
current models?

Cesar
